attributes.action: Understand possession/supply of firearms is conspiracy to murder (for all but EU police and armies)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Their purpose - fear, murder & thug rule.
 In principle, eradicate illegal possession (& increase social mobility through education) and you negate the need for such arms. The same principle should applied within the EU to be really effective. Sales outside the EU are impossible to sufficiently regulate. The last thing the world needs is more guns so break the military industrial complex, renounce violence and start sharing knowledge freely.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
